name: clean-store
description: Browser storage technologies through a common interface. Includes events

scripts.build: rollup src/index.js -o store.js --name store --output.format umd && uglifyjs store.js -o store.min.js
scripts.gzip: gzip -c store.min.js | wc -c && echo 'bytes' # Only for Unix

author: Francisco Presencia <public@francisco.io> (https://francisco.io/)
